member.name: M:FilterDigit.DigitsFilter.FilterDigit(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Method looks for and removes numbers that contain specific digit.
member.param: List of integers we look in.

member.name: M:FilterDigit.DigitsFilter.NumberExists(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Method checks if list[0..k-1] already contains number list[k]. Required to remove repeating elemens in List.
member.returns: true if element exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:FilterDigit.DigitsFilter.CheckDigits(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Simple method that checks if number contains given digit.
member.returns: true if number found, false otherwise.
